video.title: Fish Tank Kings
video.synopsis: Dive into the world of extreme fish tanks with this show that follows aquarium specialists as they assemble some truly elaborate underwater creations.

episodes.synopsis: Mat gets a chance to create an extraordinary aquarium for the new Miami Marlins stadium; mistakes and lost production time mean Jose works overtime.
episodes.title: 7th Inning Catch

episodes.synopsis: Mat promises rarely-seen deep sea fish for a new exhibit at the Florida Aquarium; the team races to complete a 3,000-gallon tank.
episodes.title: Pimp My Tank

episodes.synopsis: Mat and the warehouse crew get caught up building a custom aquarium for IndyCar champ Ryan Hunter-Reay; Francis comes to the aid of a giant octopus.
episodes.title: Finsanity

episodes.synopsis: Mat and John revamp an aquarium for a Las Vegas recording studio; Frances must relocate a nurse shark who has gotten too big for her tank.
episodes.title: Card Sharks

episodes.synopsis: Mat and his team encounter a client who wants a massive live coral reef tank; basketball's Alonzo Mourning wants an aquarium for his youth center.
episodes.title: Fish Upon a Star

episodes.synopsis: Mat's team faces some new challenges when they must prove they are capable of redesigning a huge canopy aquarium inside the Rainforest Café.
episodes.title: Extreme Tankover

episodes.synopsis: The van is a-rockin' when a car dealer hires Living Color to transform a Volkswagen minibus into the hottest fish tank on wheels!
episodes.title: The Amazing Aqua-Van

episodes.synopsis: The team helps a nature center revive their aquarium with a replica of a natural habitat, requiring one of them to swim with ocean carnivores.
episodes.title: Big Bowl of Gumbo Limbo

episodes.synopsis: The heat is on when Ben tries to uphold the team's reputation, installing flame-themed fish tanks around the Reuss family's fireplace.
episodes.title: Desperate Housetanks

episodes.synopsis: Francis finds himself between a tank and a hard place when pressures from his professional and personal life escalate and collide.
episodes.title: Love's a Beach

episodes.synopsis: When the team balks at a daunting project, Living Color's most demanding client, Disney World's Rainforest Café, refuses to take no for an answer.
episodes.title: Turning a New Reef

episodes.synopsis: Jose takes on a nerve-wracking assignment that involves handling a case of shark eggs; Living Color builds an aquarium featuring a mermaid's purse.
episodes.title: Little Mermaids

episodes.synopsis: Jose struggles to create a slice of Africa in a tank that features an African sausage tree; Living Color falls behind schedule.
episodes.title: There's a Tree in My Tank

episodes.synopsis: The South Florida Science Museum hires Mat and his team for an enormous project that involves redesigning 14 tanks and 27 reefs.
episodes.title: 14 Tanks and a Shipwreck

episodes.synopsis: Living Color is hired to build South Florida’s largest private tank, and all 50,000 gallons have to fit through the window.
episodes.title: Shark Tank

episodes.synopsis: Living Color’s reputation as innovators precedes them as a new restaurant commissions an abstract aquarium to complement their modern look.
episodes.title: Secret Crystal Cave Fish Palace

episodes.synopsis: The Living Color crew flies out to California to help design a celebrity client’s desert oasis, where there is no viable water source for miles.
episodes.title: The Fish Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: Living Color is tasked with doing the technically impossible and create a stunning cylindrical tank for a posh hotel in New York City.
episodes.title: Empire Tank Building

episodes.synopsis: Living Color improves on paradise when they are commissioned to build a jellyfish tank for the Atlantis Casino's high roller room in the Bahamas.
episodes.title: Jellyfish Jackpot

episodes.synopsis: Living Color takes on two special projects with the potential to make a positive impact on the lives of young students and abandoned pets.
episodes.title: Go Fish!

episodes.synopsis: The Living Color crew have their minds blown when they are called in to refurbish a 25,000-gallon snorkeling tank underneath a client’s home.
episodes.title: Pufferfish Palace

episodes.synopsis: There is only one client who can get away with asking for an aquarium that is interactive and looks delicious -- and that is Hershey’s!
episodes.title: Sweetest Tank on Earth
